contentList:
Wild Magic: See Invisibility! You gain <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_SeeInvisibility">See Invisibility</LSTag>.
You cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fireball">Fireball</LSTag> centered on yourself.
Wild Magic: Forceful! Your spells deal an additionl [1] per spell level. Your weapon attacks deal an additional [1].
You are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POLYMORPH_CHEESE">Polymorphed</LSTag> into cheese.
Afflicted with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CONFUSION">Confusion</LSTag>. You are hostile to everyone, wander around aimlessly, and occasionally skip turns in your stupor.
Wild Magic: Dependable Healing! You regain [1] at the start of each of your turns.
You are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INCAPACITATED">Incapacitated</LSTag>.
Wild Magic: Greased! You cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Grease">Grease</LSTag> centered on yourself.
Wild Magic: Bad Saving Rolls! All other creatures in a [1] radius of you have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on all <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>. Suffers <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on all <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Wild Magic: Faerie Fire! Cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_FaerieFire">Faerie Fire</LSTag> centered on yourself.
Wild Magic: Mind Sanctuary! You summon a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="TAD_MIND_SANCTUARY_AURA">Mind Sanctuary Bubble</LSTag> centered on yourself and can use <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ActionPoint">Actions</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Actions</LSTag> interchangeably.
Wild Magic: Curse of Truth! You are compelled to always tell the truth. You have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Deception">Deception</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SkillCheck">Skill Checks</LSTag>.
You are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BANISHED">Banish</LSTag> to another plane of existence.
Wild Magic: Maximum Damage! The next spell that hits does maximum damage.
Wild Magic: Static Shock You become charged with a massive amount of static electricity. When a creature hits you with a melee attack, you deal 1d6 lightning damage to them. Wild Magic: Healed You regain 2d10 hitpoints. Wild Magic: Charmed For one minute, any creature that hits you will be charmed for 2 turns. Wild Magic: Push Back For one minute, any creature that hits you with a melee attack is pushed back 10 foot. Wild Magic: Hearty You have advantage on all Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>. This condition is removed after a long rest. 21-30 Wild Magic: Mass Blink For one minute, all allies (including yourself) in a 30 foot radius fall under the Blink condition. Wild Magic: Mass Friends All non-hostile creatures have the spell Friends cast on them. This spell lasts for 10 minutes. Wild Magic: Headache A distracting headache is making it difficult to think clearly. Your Intelligence is reduced by 2. This condition is removed after a long rest. Wild Magic: Refreshed Spells You regain all of your expended Level 1 spell slots. Wild Magic: Curse of Glow Your body starts to glow and emits a light that eliminates nearby darkness. Wild Surge: Lightning Storm Lightning strikes! All creatures (except yourself) in a 15 foot radius take 2d10 lightning damage. Creatures that succeed a dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> take half damage. Wild Magic: Boo! You are Frightened for 2 turns. Wild Magic: Mass Invisibility Every creature in a 30 foot radius becomes invisible. Wild Magic: Stone Skin For one minute, you are resistant to all physical damage. Wild Magic: Mass Poison All creature (except yourself) in a 60 foot radius must succeed on a Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or becomed Poisoned for 2 turns. 31-40 Wild Magic: Blinding Glow You glow brightly in a 30 foot radius. Any enemy that is within 10 foot will be blinded. Blinded creatures must roll a Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> to remove this condition. Wild Magic: Polymorphed! You become a sheep for 5 turns. Wild Magic: SUMMON OWLBEAR! You summon a hostile Owlbear. Wild Magic: Minor Illusion You summon a minor illusion that lasts for one minute Wild Action: Unkillable Enemies All hostile enemies in a 60 foot radius gain the Death Ward condition. On a lethal hit, they survive with 1 hitpoint remaining. Wild Magic: Mass Drain Life All creatures (except yourself) take 1d10 necrotic damage, or take half as much damage with a successful Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>. You regain half of all damage dealt. Wild Magic: Mirror Image You cast Mirror Image on yourself. Wild Magic: Mass Flight All creatures in a 30 foot radius gain the ability to fly.
You cast Invisibility on yourself. Invisibility ends early if you attack, cast another spell, interact with an object, take an action or bonus action, or are damaged.
You are able to use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Teleportation_Revivify">Revivify</LSTag> until your next <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
For 10 rounds all creatures become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ENLARGE">Enlarged</LSTag>, gaining <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>. Weapon attacks deal 1d4 less damage.
For 10 rounds all creatures in a [1] become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="REDUCE">Reduced</LSTag> condition. While Reduced, entities have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>. Weapon attacks deal 1d4 less damage. Wild Magic: Piercing Vulnerability All creatures (including yourself) in a 30 foot radius are vulnerable to piercing damage for one minute. Wild Magic: Curse of Clown You are cursed to become a clown. You gain +1 Charisma (up to a maximum 20) and have immunity to Tasha's Hideous Laughter. Wild Magic: Extra Action You gain another action for the duration of combat. Wild Magic: Restore Sorcery Points You regain all expended Sorcery Points.
Wild Magic: Restore Rage Charges You regain all expended Rage Charges.
Wild Magic: Mass Haste You cast Haste on all creatures (except yourself) in a 30 foot radius. Wild Magic: Lock You temporarily lock all doors and chests nearby in a 100 foot radius for one minute. Wild Magic: Unlock You unlock all nonmagical locks in a 100 foot radius. Wild Magic: Summon Menagerie For one minute, you enjoy the company of a menagerie of familiars. 51-60 Wild Magic: Critical Hits For the next 3 turns, all of your attack rolls are critical. Wild Magic: Mind Readers You are able to read minds and gain access to the spell Detect Thoughts. Others are able to read your mind as well. You have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on all Charisma based <LSTag Tooltip="SkillCheck">Skill Checks</LSTag>. This condition is removed after a long rest. Wild Magic: Random Vulnerability At the start of your next turn, all creatures in a 30 foot radius will become vulnerable to a random damage type. This condition will last for one minute. Wild Magic: Acid Vulnerability For one minute, all creatures in a 30 foot radius are vulnerable to Acid. Wild Magic: Cold Vulnerability For one minute, all creatures in a 30 foot radius are vulnerable to Cold. Wild Magic: Fire Vulnerability For one minute, all creatures in a 30 foot radius are vulnerable to Fire. Wild Magic: Force Vulnerability For one minute, all creatures in a 30 foot radius are vulnerable to Force. Wild Magic: Lightning Vulnerability For one minute, all creatures in a 30 foot radius are vulnerable to Lightning. Wild Magic: Necrotic Vulnerability For one minute, all creatures in a 30 foot radius are vulnerable to Necrotic Damage. Wild Magic: Explosive Spells! When you cast a spell of 1st level or higher, you deal 1d6 fire damage in a 10 foot radius around the target. Targets that succeed a dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> take half damage. For a spell of first level or higher, add a additional 1d6. Wild Magic: Petrified! You are Petrified for 3 turns.
Wild Magic: Full Heal The next time you are healed, you regain full health. Wild Magic: Burning Greed For every 500 gold you have in your inventory, you take 1d6 fire damage.
Wild Magic: Summon Percy! Percy the Pacifist You summon Percy, the Pacifist Kobold. Percy will help you, but will not attack. Percy knows the spells Sanctuary, Heroism, Healing Word and Resistance. Curse of Pacifism If this creature attacks another creature, they explode in a 20 foot radius and take 8d4+36 Force Damage. Creatures that succeed a dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> take half damage.
Wild Magic: Mass Fear All creatures in a 30 foot radius that fail a Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> become fearful of you and drop their weapons. Wild Magic: CRAAAAAAB! You summon six hostile crabs.
Bob the Friendly Zombie Wild Magic: Summon Bob Summon Bob the Friendly Zombie Wild Magic: Curse of Vampirism You are cursed with Vampirism! You gain access to Bite, Claws, and Charm Person. Your Charisma increases by 1 (up to a maximum 20). Wild Magic: Gaseous Form! You transform into a cloud of mist for 3 turns. Wild Magic: Rain A rainstorm starts above you; Anything underneath the storm becomes wet. Wild Magic: Burning Immunity You become immune to fire for one minute. You are also on fire for one minute. You can not put out this fire. Wild Magic: Storm Sorcerer You temporarily gain the powers of a Storm Sorcerer. You have access to the spells Thunderwave, Create or Destroy Water, Gust of Wind, Sleet Storm, and Call Lightning, and gain the passive Heart of the Storm. This condition is removed after 1 minute. Wild Magic: Random Ability Decrease At the start of your next turn, one of your Abilities will be reduced by 5 for one minute. Wild Magic: Strength Descrease Your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> has been decreased by 5 for one minute. Wild Magic: Dexterity Descrease Your Dexterity has been decreased by 5 for one minute. Wild Magic: Constitution Descrease Your Constitution has been decreased by 5 for one minute. Wild Magic: Intelligence Descrease Your Intelligence has been decreased by 5 for one minute. Wild Magic: Wisdom Descrease Your Wisdom has been decreased by 5 for one minute. Wild Magic: Charisma Descrease Your Charisma has been decreased by 5 for one minute. Wild Magic: Random Ability Increase At the start of your next turn, one of your Abilities will be increased by 5 (up to a maximum 20) for one minute. Wild Magic: Strength Increase Your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> has been increased by 5 (up to a maximum 20) for one minute. Wild Magic: Dexterity Increase Your Dexterity has been increased by 5 (up to a maximum 20) for one minute. Wild Magic: Constitution Increase Your Constitution has been increased by 5 (up to a maximum 20) for one minute. Wild Magic: Intelligence Increase Your Intelligence has been increased by 5 (up to a maximum 20) for one minute. Wild Magic: Wisdom Increase Your Wisdom has been increased by 5 (up to a maximum 20) for one minute. Wild Magic: Charisma Increase Your Charisma has been increased by 5 (up to a maximum 20) for one minute. Wild Magic: Disarm All All creatures (except yourself) in a 30 foot radius drop their weapons. Wild Magic: Mass Charm All enemies in a 30 foot radius must succeed a Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or be charmed by you for the next 2 turns. 71-80 Wild Magic: Pick Me Up All downed allies in a 60 foot radius regain 1 health. Wild Magic: Freedom of Movement All creatures (including yourself) in a 30 foot radius are under the Freedom of Movement condition for one minute. Wild Magic: Unstable Blood Your blood is highly flammable and will explode in contact with fire. This condition is removed after a long rest. Wild Magic: Irresistible Dance For one minute, all hostile enemies within a 30 foot radius are afflicted with Otto's Irresistible Dance. Creatures must succeed a Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> to remove this condition. Wild Magic: Summmon Spectator? A friendly Spectator appears, and fights for you for one minute. Wild Magic: Temporary Genius You have temporarily increased your Intelligence by 4. Following a short rest, this benefit ends and your Intelligence is instead reduced by 2. Either condition is removed following a long rest. Wild Magic: Armor Up Gain 15 <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag>. Wild Magic: Heroes Feast You cast the spell Heroes Feast. Wild Magic: Wild Magic For All! At the start of their next turn, all creatures (including yourself) trigger a random Wild Magic Surge. Wild Magic: SHEEP! All hostile enemies in a 60 foot radius are polymorphed into sheep. TEMPORARY
